messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI_LatentToRGB custom node?
The ComfyUI_LatentToRGB custom node is designed to convert latent images to RGB format.
Where does the transformation matrix used in ComfyUI_LatentToRGB come from?
The transformation matrix for the ComfyUI_LatentToRGB node is taken from a discussion on the Hugging Face forums: https://discuss.huggingface.co/t/decoding-latents-to-rgb-without-upscaling/23204/2.
